title: AI Travel Tech - Senior Node.js Engineer (Remote OR On-site)
description:
Having navigated the Covid Pandemic successfully, my client within the travel tech space is building a new Engineering team in Munich from scratch. Besides working on the existing web platform, you would get a chance to build new products such as an AI booking Tool to diversity their offering. 
What we offer

Company Pension Scheme
Additional Health Insurance
Ability to work 100% remote or on site. Whatever you prefer!
Base salary for our Senior Developers between 60,000-80,000 EUR
Free German classes
Discount on our travel tech platform
Home office as much as you need it
The chance to build a new team and products
Modern office and setup (should you be sick of working from home)
For relocators we offer a relocation package as well as a company flat option
Gym and transport ticket
Training Budget and career coaching
Regular company Events



Senior Web Engineer in a completely new team
Not only code maintenance but the chance to build 4 new products and bring in your ideas to make them a hit with millions of users across the EU
Use a modern tech stack: Node.js, JavaScript, React.js, Redux.js
Work within an agile and continuous delivery environment
You can choose between a Backend focused role or a Fullstack one.
As part of the current growth our client are also looking to Fastrack Engineers into Team Leads, should this be of interest
All starters will get the chance to come and work in the UK Headquarters for an onboarding period (with current vaccine rollout this should be possible by the Summer) Having navigated the Covid Pandemic successfully, my client within the travel tech space is building a new Engineering team in Munich from scratch. Besides working on the existing web platform, you would get a chance to build new products such as an AI booking Tool to diversity their offering. What we offer

title: Backend Engineer - Javaflix
description:
Our Munich based client is building a highly innovative web platform in the streaming space. Due to company- and sector growth, they are looking to hire across the company, including for the Java Engineering Team. 
As Java Software Engineer, you will contribute towards growing out the product further with  new features and further product launches in virtual reality and AI. 
This is an opportunity to work on a product that is redefining the entertainment landscape. The opportunity will also allow you to share tech knowledge with Developers from partners such as Netflix, Amazon and Dazn. 
What is on offer:

Option for share ownership in the company + competitive salary
Remote friendly culture
You can take our word that you will not be bored in this role. This role is demanding and the tasks vary constantly.
The chance to work on a highly complex and innovative product with technologies such as: Java 11, Kotlin, Spring Boot, AWS Cloud Stack, Nginx, Undertow, Docker, Kubernetes, and many more.
Flat hierarchies. You report directly to the CTO
A truly agile company (yes really!)
MacBooks and company phone as standard. Happy to get you any equipment you need though
Your own tailored training budget
When home office becomes lonely, you can come work in our new office in central Munich Our Munich based client is building a highly innovative web platform in the streaming space. Due to company- and sector growth, they are looking to hire across the company, including for the Java Engineering Team. As Java Software Engineer, you will contribute towards growing out the product further with  new features and further product launches in virtual reality and AI. This is an opportunity to work on a product that is redefining the entertainment landscape. The opportunity will also allow you to share tech knowledge with Developers from partners such as Netflix, Amazon and Dazn. What is on offer:

title: Senior Backend Engineer (Node.js/Python) - Stealth Startup
description:
A new, secret technology startup in the consumer electronics space is looking for a Senior Backend Engineer to build an exciting innovative product from scratch.
You will be on a mission to build a product from scratch and in doing so help build a product that for over a billion users is life-changing.
This is a unique opportunity to work closely with a Munich based Founder who has a track record as being a successful Entrepreneur and Engineering executive with significant experience building and leading internationally distributed high-performance development teams.  
What is on offer:

Base salary up to 90,000 EUR
Potential for stock options for our most Senior positions
Remote working supported
The chance to work on something that matters
Further company benefits to be discussed based on your needs A new, secret technology startup in the consumer electronics space is looking for a Senior Backend Engineer to build an exciting innovative product from scratch. You will be on a mission to build a product from scratch and in doing so help build a product that for over a billion users is life-changing. This is a unique opportunity to work closely with a Munich based Founder who has a track record as being a successful Entrepreneur and Engineering executive with significant experience building and leading internationally distributed high-performance development teams. title: Senior Java Developer - Greenfield
description:
We´re partnering with one of Germany´s most promising corporate start-ups with a remarkable to redesign how businesses manage their digitalization.
We´re searching an experienced Java Engineers to join an ambitios team set out to do justice to today’s digital reorientation.
You´ll have the option to work remotely or onsite form the HQ in Nürnberg. 
What is also on offer:

Base salary up to 95,000 EUR + Benefits
Remote option
Company pension scheme & private health insurance
Holiday flats for employees - multiple vacation homes in Spain and Italy
Free transportation ticket & company car park
Gym membership, participation in B2Run & health programs
You can take our word that you will not be bored in this role. This role is demanding and the tasks vary constantly
MacBooks and company phone as standard. Happy to get you any equipment you need though
Career progression in a highly successful company group and your own tailored training budget



Lead and provide technical leadership to an agile development team
You´ll build highly innovative & complex products in a top modern software architecture environment
You´ll be responsible for the whole software lifecycle, you will build products from scratch, as well as new important features to the exciting products
You come with ideas on how to make the products even better and you incorporate the newest technology when applicable
Lean & Agile Development processes are the standard
The Tech Stack that you´ll be working with: Java, Spring Boot, AWS, Docker, Elasticsearch, Kubernetes, and much more...

For this position, we´re looking for someone with good command in both German and English. We´re partnering with one of Germany´s most promising corporate start-ups with a remarkable to redesign how businesses manage their digitalization. We´re searching an experienced Java Engineers to join an ambitios team set out to do justice to today’s digital reorientation. You´ll have the option to work remotely or onsite form the HQ in Nürnberg. What is also on offer:  For this position, we´re looking for someone with good command in both German and English.

title: Senior Node.js AI Engineer
description:
If you're a Node.js Developer and want to be part of the next step of human digital transformation, then please keep reading...
My client is building an AI-Based platform that will make coding as we know it obsolete. It will create a future where companies can build without coding.
After receiving over +120 Million Euros in investment, they are looking to grow the team with skilled Node.js Developers.
More so, they will make you a part owner in the company, which is pretty cool since it´s voted as one of the most promising startups in the whole of Germany 2021.  
Your mission:

Build and run new powerful features and services for the core product.
Bring in your own ideas and vision and ultimately be part of the next step of human digital transformation. 

What is on offer?

Ownership in the company via shares
Salary up to 95k Eur
1000 Eur work from home allowance
2500 Eur to spend on training courses
100% Remote working. If you prefer you can also work from the Berlin, New York or London offices
You work with some of the best Engineers on the market
A safe and stable Job in a booming Industry
Free trips with your remote team to summer locations such as Portugal
And much much more... If you're a Node.js Developer and want to be part of the next step of human digital transformation, then please keep reading...
